item.description:
On Saturday, April 21st, 2012 at 5:30 pm, the TAPS Home Team will present "An Introduction to the Paranormal" presentation with a Q&A to follow.

This event is open to the public. Tickets are sold at the door, $10 for adults and $5 for those under 18, and 100% of the proceeds will go to programs at Little Harbour School. The event is recommended for kids over age 12, parents’ discretion.

Thanks to the show "Ghost Hunters" The Atlantic Paranormal Society is the most famous investigative team in the world. The TAPS Home Team carries on the work that Jason Hawes and grant Wilson started before there was "Ghost Hunters." The Home Team conducts untelevised investigations "at home" in the New England region. Members of the TAPS Home Team recently appeared on the Ghost Hunters Halloween Live Show and are now here in Portsmouth, NH to teach you what they do, how they do it and what they encounter in the field. Real evidence will be played and equipment will be available to explore.

** This is not an SPRG or KRI event … You do not need to RSVP to attend this event***
item.name: TAPS Home Team presents An Introduction to the Paranormal
